name: a woman goes walking
description:
A text based adventure game about a woman going for a walk.

80% of women in the United States have experienced some form of sexual harassment in public spaces in their life. For more information on street harassment statistics, and to learn how to protect yourself and others against harassment, visit standup-international.com.

instagram | twitter

Want to tip? Please donate to Futures Without Violence, The Malala Fund, National Women's Law Center, or your local women's charities.
